      • getObjectType

        public java.lang.String getObjectType()
        Description copied from interface: com.intellinum.mia.app.runtime.Transferable
        Get the object type of the UIObject. For example, Page will return "Page" and Div class will return "Div" Type is used in client application for creating a new UI.
        Returns:

      • getJSONObjectProperties

        public org.json.JSONObject getJSONObjectProperties(org.json.JSONObject properties)
        Description copied from interface: com.intellinum.mia.app.runtime.Transferable
        Extract UI object properties into JSON Object. A new UI Class only need to add it's new properties into the json object and call the super.getJSONObjectProperties so that the properties of the parent class will be added
        Specified by:
        getJSONObjectProperties in interface com.intellinum.mia.app.runtime.Transferable

      • doAction

        public void doAction(com.intellinum.mia.app.action.Action action)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: FlexiUIObject
        Action taken when receive an input from server. when create a new UI class, override this function as needed For Example, when creating a new button UI class, it needs a special handle when the button is pressed. So the new class should override this function, using if commands to capture the SUBMIT action and then do the desired behaviour. if the commands is not SUBMIT, the pass it to the super.doAction;
        Overrides:
        doAction in class Component<Image>
        Parameters:
        action - SE
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
